description.value:
Requirements You are benefiting from Aldori Parry.

Trigger An opponent within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

You riposte with your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Aldori Dueling Sword] when your enemy leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike or use a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm] action against the triggering opponent using your Aldori dueling sword.
